attributes.action: Allow Tulip Bahadar Pun V.C. to enter this country as a resident and to allow treatment on the NHS for his illnesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tul Bahadar Pun V.C. eighty four years old won Britains highest military award for bravery during the second world war plus ten other medals during his eighteen years sevice with the Ghurkas.He is now living in a hut with no proper roof, running water, or sanitation in a village 16000 feet up in the himalayas. He has bad eyesight,  hearing difficulties, diabetes, and high blood pressure. Ther are no doctors, nurses or medical outposts, consequently he feels very vulnerable. He has to pay for these medications which are quite substantial out of his pension of £132 per month.As a deserving case, he should,without question be allowed into this country to settle with his old comrades, and receive medical treatmnet

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
